titles: A tale of tvvo swannes VVherein is comprehended the original and increase of the riuer Lee commonly called Ware-riuer: together, with the antiquitie of sundrie places and townes seated vpon the same. Pleasant to be read, and not altogether vnprofitable to bee vnderstood. By W.V.
author: Vallans, William.
publisher: Printed by Roger Ward, for Iohn Sheldrake,
notes: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Hertfordshire (England) --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
